attributes.action: The public's taxes should not pay for Thatchers state funeral.
attributes.additional_details: The British tax payers hard earned money should never pay for the funeral of the Iron Lady, even though she was Britain's firs female leader. Many problems occurred due to Thatcher, Union troubles with parliament, Privatisation of parts of British industry as well as the potential cover up of a sporting disaster in Sheffield on April 15th 1989 and the right wing policies that brought bad fortunes to the working class of Britain.
